      • getLocalTunnel

        public abstract HostAndPort getLocalTunnel(int remotePort)
        Returns host and port which one should connect to get to the process remote port. Returns null if connection to the remote port is impossible or there is no information about it.
        Parameters:
        remotePort - remote process port
        Returns:
        host:port
